name: Advanced Seminar in Culture and Cities
description: This course offers an in-depth examination of selected topics in Culture and Cities. Check the department website for details at: www.utsc.utoronto.ca/sociology/programs.
prerequisites: [10.0 credits and SOCB05H3 and [1.0 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB44H3, SOCB47H3, SOCB58H3]] or [10.0 credits including SOCB58H3 and enrolment in the Minor in Culture, Creativity, and Cities]
